popover.primary: A mastery path focused on destroying your enemies
A mastery path focused on hindering and crippling your foes
A mastery path focused on supporting and bolstering you and your allies

data.name: Deflect Oil
data.description: 25% reduction in damage taken by Oil siege engines. You will also protect two other group mates within 30 feet. Only one effect of this type may be on a player at a time.

data.name: Modify War Engine
data.description: You shield the Ram absorbing 1500 damage over the next 30 seconds.

data.name: Bulwark
data.description: Repairs a friendly keep door for 5% of it's total health over 15 seconds.

data.name: Flee
data.description:
You run away from the battle in a mad panic, increasing your run speed by 30 for 10 seconds. You immediately lose all of your action points, any career mechanic points, and your Morale will begin to drop, and you will not begin to regain action points until 10 seconds have passed.

You can use this ability again to cancel the effect early, but you will still remain panicked and will not regain action points for the full duration.

data.name: Throw Blade
data.description: A basic throwing attack that inflicts 81 damage. Has a chance to deal 680 damage to a severely wounded target if you are behind them.

data.name: Taunt
data.description: You enrage your opponent, interrupting any currently building abilities and forcing monsters to attack you. While taunted your opponent will take 30% more damage from your attacks. This effect will fade after 15 seconds or after your opponent has hit you 3 times.

data.name: Demolishing Strike
data.description: A powerful melee attack that reduces  your target's armor by 1056 and deals 900 damage over 15 seconds

data.name: Emperor's Ward
data.description:
Any time you are attacked, there is a 25% chance that you will become protected by a magical barrier for up to 10 seconds, which will absorb up to 375 damage.
This effect will not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.

data.name: Hold The Line!
data.description:
You focus your defenses against enemy fire, increasing your chances to dodge and disrupt by 45% for 12 seconds. You will also defend all allies behind you, up to 50 feet away, increasing their chances to dodge and disrupt by 15% as long as they remain at your back. Allies may have this effect stacked on them up to 3 times.
This effect will end if you break your concentration, or run out of action points.

data.name: Guard
data.description:
You defend one of your groupmates and try to take attacks meant for them. As long as you are within 30 feet of them, any damage that they suffer will be split evenly between the two of you, and 35% of all hate that they cause will be redirected to you.

Damage received from this ability can be blocked or parried, unless the original attack was undefendable.

data.name: Juggernaut
data.description: You become filled with unstoppable power, removing all snaring, rooting, silencing, and disarming effects.

data.name: Shield Wall
data.description: For the next 10 seconds, your chance to block is almost guaranteed.

data.name: Focused Offense
data.description: You deal 15% more damage and all enemy monsters will hate you 15% less than normal, but your armor is reduced by 33%.

data.name: Rugged
data.description: Increases Toughness by 160.

data.name: Champion's Challenge
data.description:
Both you and your target are held tightly in place for 10 seconds, and neither one of you can move.
This effect cannot be dispelled or broken.

data.name: Unwavering Faith
data.description: Increases your Spirit resistance by 252.

data.name: Challenge
data.description: You challenge all opponents in front of you, forcing monsters to attack you. While challenged, your opponents will deal only 70% damage to everyone other than you. This effect will fade after 15 seconds or after your opponent has hit you 3 times.

data.name: Raze
data.description: You repeatedly attack all enemies in a line in front of you, inflicting 300 damage every second  for 3 seconds, up to 65 feet away, for as long as you maintain your concentration.

data.name: Gilded Shield
data.description: Increases your chance to disrupt attacks by 15% as long as you're holding a shield.

data.name: Sigmar's Favor
data.description: Any time that you are healed by a direct heal, there is a 25% chance that you will regain an additional 135 hit points as well.

data.name: Distracting Bellow
data.description: A loud shout that startles your target and all enemies within 30 feet of them, reducing their damage to 50% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Menace
data.description: Enemy monsters will hate you 100% more than normal on all attacks.

data.name: Biting Blade
data.description: Any time you critically hit an enemy, they will suffer an additional 350 damage over 10 seconds and their parry chance will be reduced by 5%.

data.name: Efficient Swings
data.description: Detaunts are dispelled automatically when applied to you.

data.name: Guardian of Light
data.description: You become surrounded by a protective barrier for up to 30 seconds which will absorb up to 3600 damage.

data.name: Unstoppable Juggernaut
data.description: Juggernaut's cooldown is reduced to 20 seconds.

data.name: Shackle
data.description: Your cowardly enemies are forced to face your wrath.  Up to 4 enemies within 30 feet are rooted in place, making them unable to move for 5 seconds.  Rooted targets have a 50% chance to break free when they suffer damage.

data.name: Sun's Blessing
data.description: Shield Of The Sun and Perseverance will now cool down 50% faster.

data.name: Emperor's Champion
data.description: Increases your Strength, Toughness, and Wounds by 240 for 15 seconds.

data.name: Well-Trained
data.description: Smashing Counter, Shield Rush, and Vicious Slash no longer cost action points.

data.name: Banish Darkness
data.description:
Repel Darkness will now send the victim flying even further away from you.
If wearing a Great Weapon it will also cool down 50% faster.

data.name: No Escape
data.description: Deals 1200 damage to all enemies within 30 feet and roots them, making them unable to move for 10 seconds.

data.name: Bellow Commands
data.description: Battle Commands will restore 5 action points every second for each of your active Battle Commands.

data.name: Immaculate Defense
data.description: An impressive display of defense which reduces incoming damage by 75% for both you and all group members within 100 feet of you for 10 seconds.

data.name: Press The Attack!
data.note: May only use three Battle Commands at a time
data.description: You order your group to strike fiercely, increasing Strength by 120 for all groupmates within 100 feet.  All enemies within 30 feet will be frightened, reducing their Strength by 120.

data.name: Precision Strike
data.description: A careful strike that deals 209 damage, and ignores 15% of the victim's armor.

data.name: Crippling Blow
data.description: A cruel slash at your victim's legs which deals 171 damage and snares them, reducing their run speed by 40% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Shining Blade
data.description: Your Shining Blade slices into your opponent for 209 damage.  For the next 5 seconds, Shining Blade will cause an additional 150 Elemental damage on the next damaging attack made by everyone in your group within 100 feet of you.

data.name: All Out Assault!
data.note: May only use three Battle Commands at a time
data.description: You become filled with the endless power of Myrmidia, dealing 148 Elemental damage every 3 seconds to all enemies within 30 feet.

data.name: Arcing Swing
data.description: You sweep your blade out in a wide arc, dealing 109 damage to all enemies 25 feet in front of you, and reducing their Wounds by 120.

data.name: Slice Through
data.description: Crippling Blow will now hit 3 enemies within 15 feet of you, but your base damage is reduced by 10%.

data.name: To Glory!
data.note: May only use three Battle Commands at a time
data.description: You fill your group with purpose, causing all of your groupmates within 100 feet to regain 20 Action Points every 5 seconds. All enemies within 30 feet will lose 20 Action Points every 5 seconds.

data.name: Overpowering Swing
data.description: Arcing Swing will now additionally make enemies 10% more likely to be critically hit.

data.name: Myrmidia's Fury
data.description: You slam into your target without remorse, dealing up to 792 damage over 3 seconds.  This effect will end if you break your concentration or run out of action points.

data.name: Runefang
data.description: Whenever you parry an attack, your Strength and Weapon Skill will be increased by 160 for 10 seconds. This effect will not refresh itself.

data.name: Staggering Impact
data.description: Myrmidia's power bursts forth from you, slamming into all enemies within 30 feet.  All of the victims will suffer 305 damage over 10 seconds and have their chance to defend attacks reduced by 10%.

data.name: Nova Strike
data.description: Deals 1200 damage to all enemies in a line in front of you, up to 65 feet away, and an additional 1206 damage over 9 seconds.

data.name: Sunder
data.description: A smashing attack which deals 171 damage.  This attack causes monsters to hate you twice as much as normal.

data.name: Stand Strong!
data.note: May only use three Battle Commands at a time
data.description: You order your group to hold their positions, increasing Toughness by 120 for all groupmates within 100 feet.  All enemies within 30 feet will be frightened, reducing their Toughness by 120.

data.name: Shield Rush
data.description: A powerful forward slam with your shield which deals 246 damage to your enemy, and increases your chance to block by 10% for 10 seconds.

data.name: On Your Guard!
data.note: May only use three Battle Commands at a time
data.description: You order your group to ready their defenses, causing 225 damage back against any attacker who strikes a groupmate within 100 feet with a melee attack. Targets can only be damaged once every two seconds.

data.name: Perseverance
data.description: The blessings of Myrmidia fill you, increasing your Armor by 990 for 10 seconds.  Whenever you're attacked during this time, you will regain 10 Action Points.

data.name: Repel Darkness
data.description: The power of the sun blasts your enemy away, dealing 209 damage and knocking them away from you.

data.name: Coordination
data.description: Shield Rush will now also increase your chance to parry by 15%.

data.name: To Victory!
data.note: May only use three Battle Commands at a time
data.description: You order your group to steady themselves, making it 25% less likely that your groupmates within 100 feet will become set back if they're hit while using an ability.  All enemies within 30 feet will be frightened, making it 25% more likely that they'll be set back when hit.

data.name: Dirty Tricks
data.description: When you block, all members of your group within 100 feet except you will gain a 5% chance to critically hit for 10 seconds.

data.name: Smashing Counter
data.description: An overwhelming counterattack which deals 209 damage and knocks the victim down for 3 seconds.

data.name: Laurels of Victory
data.description: Vigilance will no longer reduce the damage you deal.

data.name: Vigilance
data.description: The glory of the sun fills you with power, reducing all damage that you take by 50% for 10 seconds but reducing all damage that you deal by 25%.

data.name: Flawless Defense
data.description: Increase the chances to block, dodge, parry, and disrupt attacks by 50% for 10 seconds for all group members within 100 feet of you.

data.name: Blazing Blade
data.description: The force of the sun fills your blade, dealing 142 damage to the enemy and the victim will also suffer 258 Elemental damage over the next 9 seconds. This effect is stackable up to three times.

data.name: Gather Your Resolve!
data.note: May only use three Battle Commands at a time
data.description: You order your group to steady their thoughts, increasing all resistances by 378 for all groupmates within 100 feet.  All enemies within 30 feet will be frightened, reducing their resistances by 189.

data.name: Vicious Slash
data.description: You slice deeply into your enemy, dealing 142 damage to the enemy and interrupting any abilities that they are building up.  The victim will also suffer an additional 300 damage over 5 seconds.

data.name: Stay Focused!
data.note: May only use three Battle Commands at a time
data.description: You order your group to prepare for combat, causing all of your groupmates within 100 feet to regain 132 health over 3 seconds any time they defend themselves against an attack.

data.name: Shatter Confidence
data.description: You crush your enemy's will, removing 1 Enchantment from them.  If an Enchantment is successfully removed, then the victim will also suffer 246 damage.

data.name: Shield of the Sun
data.description: The heat of the very sun itself surrounds you for 10 seconds, dealing 150 Elemental damage back to anyone that attacks you.

data.name: Sunfury
data.description: Shield Of The Sun will now deal 225 damage back against enemies, and Vicious Slash's cooldown is reduced by 1 second.

data.name: Now's Our Chance!
data.note: May only use three Battle Commands at a time
data.description: You fill your enemies with fear and doubt, causing all healing abilities to become 75% as effective when used by any enemies within 30 feet of you.

data.name: Focused Mending
data.description: Stay Focused! will now also cause groupmates in the area to receive 15% more from all healing effects used on them.

data.name: Heaven's Fury
data.description: A blazing aura of light surrounds your blade as you bring it around in a broad sweep, dealing 105 Elemental damage to all enemies in front of you up to 40 feet away.  Everyone hit by this attack will be staggered, and unable to move for 3 seconds, preventing all actions unless they are damaged.

data.name: Destroy Confidence
data.description: Shatter Confidence will now remove one additional Enchantments or Blessings from the victim, dealing damage for each one that was removed.

data.name: Unbalancing Attack
data.description: A powerful strike which knocks your enemy off-balance, dealing 209 damage and causing the victim to lose 40 Action Points.

data.name: Solar Flare
data.description: Deals 1200 damage to all enemies within 25 feet.  Enemy players hit by this effect will lose all of their Morale.
